Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController

  • class GameController
extends java.lang.Object

    GameController

    GameController class is core of this project. we will use it to run the game

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Board board
      The playground Board
      private boolean isTerminated
      Used for check game's status
      private java.util.List<Player> players
      The list of all player
      private java.util.Random randomSpin
      Random seed to generate random number

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameController()
      It will initialize players' list, flag of game and random seed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void addPlayers()
      Add 2 - 4 players and prompt every player input their name
      (package private) void initializeBoard(java.lang.String fileName)
      This method is used for initialize playing Board by config file
      private boolean isWin(Player player)
      check if this player is win or not if player's current position is exact finish point, he will win!
      private void playIteratively(Player player)
      each player playing the game get step's detail of every turn 1--2--5 print detail move player to last stop
      (package private) void reset()
      This method is used to reset game and play it again
      (package private) void run()
      every player will keep playing until one player win the game and game terminated!
      (package private) void shufflePlayers()
      This method is used to create playing order Note: if they have same spin number what can we improve?

      • isWin

        private boolean isWin(Player player)
        check if this player is win or not if player's current position is exact finish point, he will win!
        Parameters:
        player - if current play finished, check this game
        Returns:
        win or not

      • playIteratively

        private void playIteratively(Player player)
        each player playing the game
        1. get step's detail of every turn 1--2--5
        2. print detail
        3. move player to last stop
        Parameters:
        player - current player playing

      • reset
